name: gpt-context-generator
description: Generate LLM-ready Markdown code context from files and workspaces

Rodeo: Mark/Unmark File for LLM Context
Rodeo: Generate LLM Context (All Open Files)
Rodeo: Generate LLM Context (All Open Files + Imports)

gpt-context-generator.enforceFileTypes.description: When enabled, only files with extensions listed in detectedFileExtensions will be included/allowed for marking/workspace context collection. When disabled, all file types will be included.

gpt-context-generator.detectedFileExtens.description: File extensions that will be included when generating context. Supports multiple programming languages, frameworks, tools, and development workflows.
gpt-context-generator.detectedFileExtens.markdownDescription:
File extensions that will be included when generating context. Supports:

- **JavaScript/TypeScript**: js, jsx, ts, tsx, mjs, cjs, vue, svelte, astro, njk, liquid
- **Python**: py, pyi, pyw, ipynb
- **Ruby**: rb, rake, gemspec, erb, slim, haml
- **PHP**: php, phtml
- **Swift & Objective-C**: swift, m, mm, h, hpp
- **Systems Programming**: c, cpp, cc, cxx, rs, go, zig
- **Web/Styling**: html, css, scss, sass, less
- **Mobile & Cross-Platform**: java, kt, kts, gradle, plist, dart, xaml
- **Shell & Scripts**: sh, bash, zsh, bat, cmd, nsh
- **Data/Config**: json, yaml, yml, toml, ini, env, xcconfig, podspec, editorconfig, dockerignore, gitignore, eslintrc, prettierrc, stylelintrc, babelrc
- **Build & Deploy**: makefile, dockerfile, k8s
- **Documentation**: md, mdx, txt, tex
- **Query Languages**: sql, prisma
- **Data Formats**: csv, tsv, xml

gpt-context-generator.ignoreFiles.description: Files that contain ignore patterns. Each file's patterns will be used to exclude matching files from the generated context. Supports glob patterns like '*.ignore'.
gpt-context-generator.ignoreFiles.markdownDescription:
Specify files that contain ignore patterns. Each file's patterns will be used to exclude matching files from the generated context.

**Examples:**
- `.gitignore`
- `.dockerignore`
- `.rodeoignore`
- `*.ignore`

Files are processed in order, and it's okay if some files don't exist.

gpt-context-generator.tokenWarningThresh.description: Generated input token threshold to show warnings. Default is 32,000 tokens.

gpt-context-generator.outputMethod.description: Output method for the generated context (New Window or Clipboard).

gpt-context-generator.outputLanguage.description: (Using New Window Output): Select the format that VSCode treats the generated context in a window.

gpt-context-generator.includePackageJson.description: Always include package.json as part of the context

gpt-context-generator.markdownFileHandli.description: How to handle markdown files: 'raw' includes them as-is (default), 'codeblock' wraps them in code blocks like other files

gpt-context-generator.filePathFormat.description: Where to display file paths: 'inline' (in code block header), 'comment' (as separate comment), 'none' (no file path)

scripts.vscode:package: yarn run build && vsce package -o builds/rodeo-$npm_package_version.zip
